item.title: Getting your data ready for analysis
item.description: Return home Goals of this lesson Install Packages Getting your Data into R Entering data directly Reading data into R Inspecting your data How is your data frame structured? Brief intro to tidyverse Rename a variable Check for missing data Check for correct values Filtering data Getting ready for analysis Recoding variables Calculating new variables Combining data from multiple sources Shaping data Saving your work Data Challenge!
